summary: jesse and melissa meek announced they are expecting a child in a video set to the theme song from '90s television sitcom ` the fresh prince of bel-air ' ` in happy valley , oregon , livin ' it wed , bought our first house and started to build our homestead , ' melissa says in the clip . in the meeks ' parody video , melissa raps , ` when our family and friends would take longer than the two months ' the clip was viewed over 1.7 million times on youtube .

aspect: 1. An Oregon couple, Jesse and Melissa Meek, announce their pregnancy in a rap video inspired by the theme song from '90s TV sitcom 'The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air.'
2. The couple, who live in Happy Valley, Oregon, are expecting their first child.
3. The video has received over 1.7 million views on YouTube.
4. The Meeks parody the original song by rapping about how they initially hid their pregnancy from family and friends before eventually revealing it.
5. The couple shares a sonogram of their unborn child at the end of the video.
6. The video was intended to share the news of their pregnancy with loved ones who live far away.
7. Melissa Meek previously made a video capturing Jesse's reaction to the pregnancy news after she placed a tag on their dog.
8. Jesse Meek is the great-great-grandson of Oregon pioneer Joseph Lafayette Meek.
9. A Phoenixville, Pennsylvania, couple made a similar pregnancy announcement video last year using the 'Fresh Prince of Bel-Air' theme song.
explain: Jesse and Melissa Meek, an Oregon couple, announced their pregnancy in a rap video inspired by the theme song from '90s TV sitcom 'The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air.' The couple, who lives in Happy Valley, Oregon, raps about their journey of purchasing their first house and starting to build their homestead. The announcement was shared on YouTube and was viewed by over 1.7 million people.

In the given summary, it is mentioned that Jesse and Melissa Meek, who live in Happy Valley, Oregon, are expecting their first child. This key piece of information is relevant to the overall context of the video announcement of their pregnancy. The fact that the couple is expecting their first child adds an important layer to the story, as it provides more information about their personal lives and the reason for making the announcement.

Relate aspect to the summary.
The aspect provided is that the couple, who live in Happy Valley, Oregon, are expecting their first child. This information is directly linked to the summary, as the announcement video was made by Jesse and Melissa Meek, who currently live in Happy Valley, Oregon. In the video, the couple announces that they are expecting a child and raps about it. This is the aspect that adds more depth to the context of the summary, emphasizing the excitement and joy of the expecting parents.

The core idea of the given aspect is the immense popularity of the parody video created by Jesse and Melissa Meek. The video, set to the theme song from the '90s television sitcom "The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air," has gained significant attention with over 1.7 million views on YouTube. The popularity of the video can be attributed to various factors, such as its catchy lyrics, creative presentation, and relatability to audience members.

The aspect highlights an interesting and unique aspect of Jesse and Melissa Meek's announcement of their pregnancy. It focuses on how the couple chose to parody the theme song from '90s television sitcom The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air, set to their own story, as a creative way to reveal their pregnancy. The parody involves Jesse rapping about building their homestead in Happy Valley, Oregon, while Melissa raps about how their family and friends would take longer than the two months the clip was viewed on YouTube. By doing so, the Meeks made their pregnancy announcement not only memorable but also entertaining for their viewers.

The couple, Jesse and Melissa Meek, made a video announcing their pregnancy and shared a sonogram of their unborn child at the end of the video. The sonogram image was not only part of the video but also an important aspect of the announcement. By sharing the sonogram, the couple emphasized the physical aspect of their pregnancy, making the announcement more personal and emotional for the viewers. Additionally, sharing the sonogram helped to celebrate the new life growing inside Melissa and showed the excitement of the couple to become parents for the first time.

The video was shared as a way for Jesse and Melissa Meek to announce their pregnancy to their loved ones who live far away.

Elaborate: 
The video was a unique and creative way for the couple to share their exciting news with their friends and family who were not physically present with them. The parody of the "Fresh Prince of Bel-Air" theme song served as an engaging and entertaining format to reveal their pregnancy, not only to those who watched the video, but also to their extended network through social media platform, YouTube. The video was viewed over 1.7 million times, reaching a vast audience and effectively communicating their glad tidings to those who might have felt disconnected due to the distance.

In the context of the given aspect, Melissa Meek's previous video featuring Jesse's reaction to the pregnancy news after she placed a tag on their dog is mentioned. The purpose of this video was to capture Jesse's excitement and emotions as he found out Melissa was pregnant. The video gained considerable attention and can be seen as an indication of Melissa's interest in sharing intimate moments with her followers through social media. This aspect adds to the understanding of Melissa's personality and their overall approach towards sharing personal experiences on social media.

Describe the main point or central concept of the given aspect.

In this case, the aspect states that Jesse Meek is the great-great-grandson of Oregon pioneer Joseph Lafayette Meek. This means that Jesse is a direct descendant of Joseph through his great-great-grandfather lineage. Joseph Lafayette Meek was a prominent figure in Oregon in the mid-1800s, and his legacy has been passed down through generations, including Jesse, showcasing the continuity of family history and lineage.

The aspect discusses a Phoenixville, Pennsylvania, couple who made a pregnancy announcement video in the style of the 'Fresh Prince of Bel-Air' theme song. This video was created and uploaded to YouTube last year, which is the main highlight of the aspect.

Core idea: The aspect highlights the similarity between the pregnancy announcement videos made by different couples, specifically those using the 'Fresh Prince of Bel-Air' theme song. It shows that the idea of using the 'Fresh Prince of Bel-Air' theme song for pregnancy announcements is not unique to Jesse and Melissa Meek, as another couple, from Phoenixville, Pennsylvania, created a similar video last year.

Summary and aspect: Jesse and Melissa Meek are not the only couple to have made a pregnancy announcement video using the 'Fresh Prince of Bel-Air' theme song. A Phoenixville, Pennsylvania, couple created a similar video last year, which was viewed over 1.7 million times on YouTube.
